alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 8:20PM CST until January 03 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Additional accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Northern Nebraska Panhandle including Sioux, Dawes, and Box Butte Counties. This includes but is not limited to Harrison, Chadron, and Alliance. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and significantly reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Dawes; North Sioux; South Sioux
